File menu commands
 

The following commands are available through the File submenu:
 
New Creates a new document. It is advisable to immediately 'Save as' the document in order to give it a name.
Open Opens an existing document.
Open Example  The same as open but starts from the Strawberry Prolog folder.
Close Closes an opened document.
Save Saves an open document using the same file name.
Save As Saves an open document to a specified file name.
Print Prints a document.
Print Preview Displays the document on the screen as it would appear when printed.
Print Setup Selects a printer and a printer connection.
1, 2, ... Opens directly the file whose name appears after the number (these files are the last four files saved).
Exit Exits Strawberry Prolog.
